name: Host
text:
—Thank you for waiting.
Now, we will shall begin the
"Hero License Special Public Examination".

The host's announcement resonated
within the examination area.

name: Examination Operator
text:
...The signal to start has come.
Well then, that concludes the explanation.

name: Examination Operator
text:
Due to my position, I cannot offer advice,
but please leave your transformation to me. I wish you all
success in your performance and in passing the exam!

The examinees gathered in blocks in the examination area
were transformed by their assigned examiner.

Those who had completed their transformation
started running one after another.

name: Horned Exam Participant?
text:
—Alright, it has begun.
I must...
Acquire my own license.

name: Horned Exam Participant?
text:
Even in the unfamiliar environment of this planet,
I cannot afford to miss this opportunity.

A young man tightly gripped his examination card.
A grating sound came from his clenched fist.

name: Examination Operator
text:
—Next person, please.
You're the last one. I'll transform you now...
Oh, the terminal... Please wait a moment.

An alert sound echoed from the examiner's terminal,
and they began to check the terminal's status.

The young man nodded at the examiner's words.
Then, he quietly took a deep breath,
shaking off distractions.

The short, inorganic alert sound
fueled anxiety.

To calm his mind and not be disturbed by the sound,
he closed his eyes and quietly concentrated.

name: Horned Exam Participant?
text:
(...I must pass the exam.
Acquiring the license is a detour,
but it's a necessary thing to achieve my goal...)

And when the alert stopped,
and he opened his eyes, thinking the terminal was fixed—

name: Horned Exam Participant?
text:
...Hm?
Operator?
Examiner...?

No one else was there but him.
He unconsciously reconfirmed his examination card with his fingertips.

name: Horned Exam Participant?
text:
Eh, w-where's the examiner!?
I still haven't transformed...

name: Horned Exam Participant?
text:
If this continues, I...
won't be able to take the exam!?

—At the same time,
in the examination area, the examiners' waiting room.

name: Examination Operator
text:
...Yes, the pre-transformation test
is now complete.

name: Examination Operator
text:
Well then, Pubraseer-san,
Subaru-san, Hydoor-san.
Thank you for supervising the exam.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, leave it to me.
As it's part of the ceremony,
I'll strive to avoid any mistakes.

name: Subaru
text:
Haa... I was cornered by the agency,
and there was no choice,
so I came to participate...

name: Subaru
text:
But the crucial partners are you two.
It might truly be a case of "when it rains, it pours".

name: Hydoor
text:
What are you complaining about, teach!?
Well, jobs forced on you by the agency
are usually a pain in the ass. I get that.

name: Subaru
text:
...It's surprising to receive empathy from you.
If you exclude your rough speech and short temper,
you're not that troublesome yourself.

name: Subaru
text:
Well, it's not an exaggeration to say that you've gotten
better more than before, that you are no
longer needlessly shouting and intimidating other people.

name: Hydoor
text:
What!? Are you picking a fight!?
You're still muttering sarcastic things
under your breath!? Speak up!

name: Subaru
text:
...I retract my previous statement.
Can't you be a little quieter?
What if my eardrums burst?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Hey, hey, come on...
It's been a while since this group gathered.
Let's get along, shall we?

name: Pubraseer
text:
It's a little lonely without Justice,
but we'll probably see him at the ceremony venue later.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I know there's a lot we want to talk about,
but let's focus on the exam now.

As Pubraseer stepped between the two,
Hydoor and Subaru exhaled as they looked at each other.

name: Subaru
text:
...It is certainly undesirable to
continue exchanging harsh words.
Let's concentrate on the given task.

name: Hydoor
text:
Tch, I know.
We just have to battle the examinees, right?

name: Hydoor
text:
It's much better than being turned
into mannequins like in our usual work.
That swimsuit incident the other day was terrible too...

name: Subaru
text:
So Hydoor-san and I are the villains,
and Pubraseer-san is the civilian, right?
And then we interact with the examinees.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, so the two villains will be attacking me,
and then we'll observe how the examinees who will behave.

name: Examination Operator
text:
Yes, I will accompany you, Pubraseer-san.
Another person will be in charge of you two remotely.

name: Examination Operator
text:
Pubraseer-san is playing the role of a civilian,
so transformation is not necessary, but please be ready
to transform at any time, just in case.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, understood.
I had a somewhat formal feeling
due to the ceremony and exam, but—

name: Pubraseer
text:
With the festival mood,
it looks like it's going to be a fun day~!
Let's do our best, you two!

name: Hydoor
text:
...Ugh, there he goes.
Hey, teach, please stop him
if he starts getting carried away.

name: Subaru
text:
I'd be troubled if you entrusted that to me.
Pubraseer-san seems to... like fun things
in general, rather than just festivals.

name: Subaru
text:
If one can approach everything
with cheerfulness and a positive attitude,
there's nothing better, I suppose.

name: Examination Operator
text:
Alright, everyone.
Please change your clothes.
You two, please contact your assigned staff member.

name: Examination Operator
text:
Pubraseer-san, I'll be waiting in this hallway,
so please call out if you need anything.

The Operator bowed and pointed
to a bench in the hallway.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, understood.
I'll go change then.

name: Pubraseer
text:
You two, I'm looking forward
to your best villain performance!

name: Hydoor
text:
Yeah, leave it to me!
I brought clothes that makes me look extra badass,
so those rookies won't look down on me!

name: Subaru
text:
...In your case, I think you
just have to be your usual self.

name: Hydoor
text:
Oh, teach, what kind of clothes did you bring?
Do you have anything villain-like?

name: Subaru
text:
...I won't tell you.
Come on, let's go.
Pubraseer-san, see you later.

name: Hydoor
text:
What, tell me, teach!
If you're so vague,
it just makes me curious!!

Listening to the receding lively voices,
Pubraseer closed the locker room door.

And just as he was about to detransform to change,
he saw 'something' going up into the sky from the room's window.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Hm?
What is that—

It was about the size of one person,
and it was heading straight up into the sky.

It looked like an old spaceship he used to ride,
heading straight for the sky's beyond.

name: Pubraseer
text:
A very small... spaceship?
No, but that's not possible inside the colony...

name: Pubraseer
text:
...I don't know what it is,
but should I report it just in case?

name: Pubraseer
text: I'll tell the Operator from earlier.

Then, he opened the door and called out to
the Operator who should have been sitting there.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Excuse me, there's something
I'm curious about... Hm?

name: Pubraseer
text:
The Operator isn't here?
Did they go to the restroom...?

Chapter 2:
The Dazzling Warp Storm

—Within the examination area, the model city.
In one corner, a lone "Observer" stood blankly,
surveying their surroundings.

A place that looked nothing like
the observation seats of the examination venue
where they had been just moments ago.

[Player], after being enveloped in a dazzling light,
hurriedly opened their eyes and found themselves in this unfamiliar place.

options.text: I don't really understand, but I need to call for help.
First, gotta confirm my current location...!
In an emergency, first report to the company.

text:
Just as [Player] was
about to open their terminal...

...Hey there!!
Could you please help me out!?

A desperate, pleading voice
came from ahead, and [Player] looked up.

name: Horned Exam Participant?
text:
You, are you an Operator!?
Please be an Operator!

The young man urgently
grabbed [Player]'s shoulder.

options.text: It seems like an emergency, what happened?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Horned Exam Participant?
dialogue_after_selection.text:
W-Wild...?
I just learned the common language, so I don't know the details, but you are praising me... right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Horned Exam Participant?
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I don't really get it, but thanks...
No, that's enough about me, are you an Operator?
Responding to the earnest voice, [Player] nodded.

text:
In response to [Player]'s reaction,
the young man exhaled, relieved.

name: Horned Exam Participant?
text:
Ah... I'm saved. I prepared for today,
but then I tripped on the stairs,
and was attacked by animals—

name: Horned Exam Participant?
text:
And to top it off, the exam's
Operator suddenly disappeared...
I really thought it was over.

name: Horned Exam Participant?
text:
Please transform me right now!
Otherwise, I'll fail the exam
without even taking it...!!

name: Horned Exam Participant?
text:
This is my examination card!
I'm already behind,
so please help me quickly!

Just as he let go of [Player]'s shoulder,
he pressed the examination card
with his name "Denebola" into [Player]'s hand.

options.text: You mean 'help me' in that sense, huh...
I feel like there's some misunderstanding.

name: Denebola
text:
What's wrong, Operator?
Aren't you the substitute for the previous one...?

[Player] confirmed the location.
At those words, this time,
Denebola looked puzzled.

name: Denebola
text:
...Ah, this is inside the examination area, isn't it?
That's why I thought you were an Operator,
since you haven't transformed...

Denebola answered [Player] with a confused expression.
He did not seem to be lying.

options.text: ...I see, I'm in the examination area.

name: Denebola
text:
Everyone else has already
transformed and started the exam.
I need to hurry too...!

name: Denebola
text:
I'm putting everything into this exam...
Please, transform me...!

As if he was begging,
Denebola displayed the contract screen on his terminal
and showed it to [Player].

options.text: I am a reserve, so it's not wrong, I suppose.
Should I confirm with the headquarters?

text:
Overwhelmed by Denebola's desperation,
[Player] temporarily displayed Denebola's contract
on their own terminal.

And just as they were
about to operate the terminal...

...Aaaaaaah!?
I'm falling, falling, falling...!?

name: Denebola
text:
W-What was that?
Such an ominous word as "falling"—

name: Denebola
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Gah!!!?

Looking up in the direction of the voice—
A large spacesuit was falling down on Denebola's spot.

However, by the time he noticed, it was too late.
Unable to dodge, Denebola let out a loud
scream and collapsed to the ground.

name: Boy in a Spacesuit?
text:
...Ouchie.
Sorry about that.
Are you hurt?

options.text: Watch your step, watch your step!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Boy in a Spacesuit?
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My step...?
Wh... Woah!!?

text:
As if drawn by [Player]'s gaze,
the person in the spacesuit also looked down at their feet.

There was Denebola, eyes rolled back,
with stars circling his head.

name: Boy in a Spacesuit?
text:
U-Uhm...
I didn't realize there was anyone below.

name: Boy in a Spacesuit?
text:
I'm really, really sorry...
This person, they're your friend... right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Boy in a Spacesuit?
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, I thought you were friends since you were together...
Could it be, a stranger?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Boy in a Spacesuit?
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh no, they're still unconscious.
Ahh, I'm so sorry...

options.text: On the other hand, are you alright?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Boy in a Spacesuit?
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, me?
Yeah, thanks to this person, I seem to be fine.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Boy in a Spacesuit?
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I really did something bad...
Ahh... I'm so sorry.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Boy in a Spacesuit?
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heh, my suit...?
...Ah, u-uhm, thank you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Boy in a Spacesuit?
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I've never been complimented before, so I was surprised...
...But now's not the time for that.

text:
While responding to [Player],
the boy in the spacesuit hurriedly stood up
and gazed at the Denebola sprawling on the ground.

name: Boy in a Spacesuit?
text:
Ugh, it was supposed to be a good plan,
but I messed up badly...
And I caused trouble for this person too...

name: Boy in a Spacesuit?
text:
At least he's not injured,
so that's good...
I'm sorry...

Gently holding Denebola,
Orbiter turned to [Player] and introduced himself.

name: Orbiter
text:
First, I need to introduce myself, right?
I'm Orbiter.
I was about to go on an adventure in space.

A youthful, boyish voice
came from inside the spacesuit.

However, perhaps deeply regretting his actions,
his voice sounded sad,
and he seemed apologetic.

Orbiter seemed a little
relieved by [Player]'s greeting.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Good, you don't seem to be scary.
[Player], nice to meet you.
I'll apologize properly to Denebola once he wakes up.

options.text: Speaking of which, what was that 'plan'?
Why did you fall from above?

text:
Orbiter displayed an apologetic expression
on his display in response to [Player]'s question.

name: Orbiter
text:
Well...
I'd prefer if you kept it a secret...

name: Orbiter
text:
I'm not from the moon, you see.
So, I made a spaceship by hand,
and I was trying to escape from here.

name: Orbiter
text:
But I didn't know there was a ceiling in the sky...
I hit it, and then I fell down...

name: Orbiter
text:
I got caught on that big tree
over there on the way down and stopped falling,
but I couldn't move.

name: Orbiter
text:
Just when I finally got off the tree,
Denebola was below me.
Aahh...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Orbiter
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, it's all thanks to this suit.
It didn't break at all, so I was fine. But...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Orbiter
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uhm, even though I said 'escape', the people who helped me on the moon were all good people.
But...

options.text: You made a spaceship by hand...!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Orbiter
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah, I worked hard to make it!
I collected the materials little by little.
I've been preparing for today for a long time.

name: Orbiter
text:
...I wanted to explore space,
and then return to my own planet.
So, I was making a spaceship.

name: Orbiter
text:
It worked well, you know!
It's small, but it flew properly!
...Though, it did fall apart.

Orbiter showed a rather large part
he was gripping with both hands.

options.text: Is this a part of that spaceship?
It was a tiny spaceship, huh?
It seems like there are only parts left...

text:
At [Player]'s words,
Orbiter nodded.

name: Orbiter
text:
The spaceship broke when it hit the ceiling,
so all its parts scattered.

name: Orbiter
text:
This was all I could grab in the air....
I have to collect everything and fix it again.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Hey, [Player].
Have you seen a part like this anywhere...?

[Player] was handed
the part from Orbiter.

It was made of a reinforced plastic-like
material commonly used in simple, ultra-small spaceships,
and had an unfamiliar shape.

options.text: (Hmm, there's a lot I don't understand...)
(...He doesn't seem like a bad person though.)
(He's saying some pretty outlandish things, isn't he?)

text:
Just as they were
wondering what to say, then-

name: Orbiter
text:
...Eh, what's that sound?
Is it coming from your arm, [Player]...?

[Player] hurriedly checked their terminal.
However, the interval between the sounds
shortened during that time.

name: Orbiter
text:
W-What's wrong, [Player]?
That's an alert, right?
Are you okay...?

name: Orbiter
text:
It seems to be getting faster and faster...
Is it going to explode...?

[Player] hurriedly shouted
towards the worried Orbiter.

[Player]'s words were
swallowed by a blue light.
And when that light disappeared...

name: Orbiter
text:
...Huh? [Player]...?
Where did you go?

name: Orbiter
text:
—Eh, ah!?
My spaceship part is gone!!

name: Orbiter
text:
C-Could it be,
that [Player] took it...!?
W-What should I do...!?

Behind the flustered Orbiter,
Denebola's finger twitched.

name: Denebola
text:
...Ugh!
My head is throbbing...
What, what happened...?

name: Orbiter
text:
Ah, D-Denebola!
Good morning, are you okay...?
I'm sorry, it's my fault...!

name: Orbiter
text:
But, [Player]!
They took my spaceship part...!

name: Denebola
text:
Hmm...? [Player]?
Who's that...? And you are—

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, speaking of which, the Operator!
You, have you seen the Operator who was here!?

Saying that, Denebola stood up,
brushing off the dust.

Then, holding his head, he opened his other hand.
He tried to confirm the exam ticket that should have been there—

name: Denebola
text: Eh, my exam ticket is... Gone?

name: Denebola
text:
W-Where...! Where did I drop it!?
Speaking of which, before I lost consciousness...

In his gradually clearing memory,
Denebola recalled pressing the exam ticket card
into the Operator's hand.

name: Denebola
text:
A-Aaaah...!?
At that time, I definitely handed
over the exam ticket to them...!

name: Orbiter
text:
I don't know if they were an Operator,
but the one talking to you was definitely [Player], Denebola!

name: Orbiter
text:
When I fell from above,
only the two of you were here.
...I'm really sorry, Denebola.

name: Denebola
text:
F-Fell from above...?
Wait a minute, what's your name?
Please explain the circumstances chronologically....

name: Denebola
text:
And, you don't have to apologize anymore.
I won't be angry that you fell down onto me,
so please give me as clear an explanation as possible....

To the bewildered Denebola, Orbiter,
finally calm, desperately explained the situation.

name: Denebola
text:
...I see.
So, [Player] suddenly disappeared,
after being enveloped in light, right?

name: Denebola
text:
Of all things,
while holding my exam ticket
and your important part...

Denebola clutched his head.
And, he groaned, squeezing words out of his mouth.

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, what bad luck...
Why am I always 'like this'...

name: Denebola
text:
No, I can't keep grumbling about that now.
...Orbiter!

name: Orbiter
text:
U-Um.
What's wrong, Denebola?

name: Denebola
text:
You and I both will search for [Player].
We have to find them quickly.

name: Denebola
text:
According to your story, they suddenly disappeared, right?
We have no clues, but in such cases,
we just have to search everywhere.

Orbiter nodded at Denebola's words.
Confirming that, Denebola held out
his terminal in front of his body.

name: Denebola
text:
Let's exchange contact information.
It's more efficient to search in two groups.

name: Denebola
text:
If either of us finds [Player], we'll contact each other immediately.
I'll go that way, and you go that way.

name: Orbiter
text:
Okay, got it.
Contact information, right?
Just a moment!

name: Orbiter
text:
...Oh, right, Denebola!
If you happen to see parts
of my spaceship, please pick them up!

The two held their terminals to each other,
and exchanged contact information.

Then, they met each other's gaze and nodded,
before running in opposite directions.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Hmm?
What is this light—

—Within the examination area,
the examiners' locker room.

Behind Pubraseer, who was changing,
a faint blue light suddenly appeared,
and he turned his body towards it.

The light instantly took on a human shape,
and then....

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Ouch.
W-What was that all of a sudden...?

Pubraseer supported [Player] who suddenly appeared,
then lost his balance and fell over.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Your sudden appearance surprised me...
But you seem unharmed.
Now, why are you in the locker room again...?

note: imagine falling on a half-naked Pubraseer, couldn't be me

options.text: O-Oh good, it's someone I know!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-I understand.
No, I don't understand anything, but...!
Let us just calm down for now.

name: Pubraseer
text:
First, could you please get off me...?
I'll... change my clothes right away.

[Player] hurriedly got away from Pubraseer's body.
Pubraseer, now free, quickly changed into his civilian role's attire.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...I apologize for showing
you something unsightly.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Now, I still don't quite
understand what happened....

name: Pubraseer
text:
Why did you appear in the locker room...?
[Player], do you have any idea?

[Player], confused, explained the phenomena
that had occurred so far to Pubraseer.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Hmm. So, the terminal suddenly emits an alert,
then you're enveloped in light and got warped, yes?

name: Pubraseer
text:
And then, you appeared
in front of unfamiliar people—
Denebola and Orbiter.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Could that be what happened
the Operator who was assigned to me too?
No, that's too hasty of a conclusion....

Pubraseer held his chin and thought to himself.
However, without a second thought, he turned back to [Player].

name: Pubraseer
text:
...[Player].
Let's resolve your problem first.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I'm also concerned about the two you were just with,
but it would be difficult to meet up with them as things are.

name: Pubraseer
text:
However, there are still many things we don't know
about the phenomenon you are currently facing.
[Player], what do you want to do for now?

options.text: Until I find out the cause of this situation,

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
The cause, huh...
Yes, please wait a moment.
I'll go check the manual.

options.text: I want to get out of the examination area for now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, that would be good.
This is a place you normally can't enter.
Let's see if we can get you to the exit here.

options.text: I think I'll contact everyone at the company.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right, they must be worried.
Please get ready to contact them.
...Yes, this might be useful.

text:
Pubraseer operated his terminal,
and opened the examiner's guide manual.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I am serving as an examiner
in this public exam.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I've also received some prior explanation
regarding warp travel in this area.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I was told that entry and exit
would not be possible during the exam...
But then, why is [Player] here...?

Pubraseer searched the manual's entries,
and read through the necessary information.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Hmm, I see.
It seems you can't just warp
anywhere, anytime, at will.

name: Pubraseer
text:
To execute warp to exit the examination area,
you either need to issue instructions
from the "Pillar of Light" control room—

name: Pubraseer
text:
Or move to a specific warp spot,
and operate a special terminal there.

options.text: I don't know any warp spots...
Does that mean instructions were given from the control room?

name: Pubraseer
text:
I don't know at this point,
but could there be some
anomalies in the system...?

name: Pubraseer
text:
For now, [Player],
please contact the people at your agency.

After nodding at Pubraseer's words,
[Player] suddenly realized.

options.text: I'm interrupting your work, aren't I...?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, don't worry about that.
I'll also confirm with the Operations Headquarters.
If there's an anomaly during the exam, they'll take action.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Above all, you are experiencing an abnormal situation.
Responding to that situation is also part of my role as an examiner.

[Player] bowed to Pubraseer,
who answered back with a smile.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Besides, the warp spot and my meeting point aren't that far apart.
It should be fine if we head there immediately.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Well then, shall we go?
This way, [Player].

Then, the two left the locker room
and proceeded towards the warp spot.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
—Gaisei.
The exam has begun.
Let's get moving as well.

—Within the examination area,
Model City area.

There, two villains were lurking amidst the public exam,
observing their surroundings.

name: Gaisei
text:
..."Observer".
Does 'move' mean I can start battling now?

name: Gaisei
text:
I have grown a bit
bored of this waiting.
Well, let's transform quickly.

At Gaisei's attitude, his partner,
the "Observer", sighed and replied.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
...Could it be, Gaisei-kun,
that you don't understand the purpose
of us 'infiltrating' this time means?

name: Gaisei
text:
...Purpose?
The only reason for my
existence is to hone my strength.

name: Gaisei
text:
I seek no other reason.
...Or was what you said before about"being able
to fight strong opponents" just pure talk?

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
Hmm, I explained it, didn't I...?
You're mostly correct, but you're forgetting one crucial thing.

The "Observer" operated his terminal,
checking the screen displaying rows of numbers.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
"Hero License"...
It's something only successful candidates can
acquire in conjunction with this public exam.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
I looked into it 'in various ways'
because it seems convenient to have, but...
I couldn't grasp its contents.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
So, I came here to gather information.
It's like "nothing ventured, nothing gained",
do you understand?

name: Gaisei
text:
...What about it?
You're deviating from the topic of
"being able to fight strong opponents".

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
Well, please listen to the end.
Gaisei-kun, you'll be taking the license exam.

name: Yotaro
text:
The examiners should be composed of those with
enough skill and technique to test heroes...
Don't you think so?

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
That's why,
I've 'arranged things' so that you
can take the exam as an examinee, Gaisei-kun.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Hmm, isn't that good?
I don't mind anything.
Let's enjoy ourselves to the fullest.

Beside the fearlessly smiling Gaisei,
the "Observer" pondered.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
(...If I can get Gaisei-kun to acquire a license,
he can nominally become a "hero".)

The "Observer" recalled the time
when [Player] encountered Gaisei.

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
(According to Gaisei-kun,
even someone who caused an incident as a villain
can acquire a license and become a hero after resolving it.)

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
(That means, even we, who are villains,
might be able to stand on the same playing field,
we acquire a license ourselves.)

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
(It's going to be a bit tough to fabricate a fictional agency, but...
it'll be much easier to move around than it is now.)

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
...So, Gaisei-kun.
This time, besides battling,
try to earn as many exam points as possible—

Facing his supposed partner,
the "Observer" looked up.
However—

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Where did he go!?</p2>

name: Pubraseer
text:
—[Player], were you able to
contact your agency members?

Pubraseer called out, turning around
while walking through the model city.
However, [Player] shook their head.

options.text: I'm trying to contact President, but...
The line seems to be busy and I can't get through.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Hmm....
I'm also trying to contact Operations
Headquarters, but there's no response.

name: Pubraseer
text:
It doesn't seem to be a communication failure,
so that means they're also busy...
For it to be a coincidence, it's quite—

As the two were talking,
a figure appeared from the shadow of a nearby street.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Well, oh my!
If it isn't Operator [Player]-dono.
To think we would meet again here.
Gaisei grinned and gazed at [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gaisei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Does it mean that the power of this mere unworthy one is not worth remembering?
...Fuh, hahaha!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gaisei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, as expected, you are interesting.
Then, let us once again engrave me into your memory...!

options.text: Gaisei, I wanted to see you too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gaisei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh...!
That's the greatest honor.
To think you would feel that way about me!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gaisei
dialogue_after_selection.text: How much I have longed to feel your astonishing commanding ability once again...!

text:
As if unable to conceal his excitement,
Gaisei naturally approached [Player].

name: Gaisei
text:
Is the person next to you a hero?
I perceive him to be a
strong individual as well.

name: Gaisei
text:
As promised the other day, this time,
with all my power and skill,
let us spend a blissful time together.

name: Pubraseer
text:
A blissful time...?
[Player], do you know him?
Who... is he?

Pubraseer spoke to [Player],
who was bracing themselves at Gaisei's appearance.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text: I know you have many acquaintances, but have you gotten caught up in trouble somewhere else again...?

name: Gaisei
text:
...Excuse me.
My name is Gaisei.
It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Oh, thank you for being so polite.
I am Pubraseer.
I'm a hero at Labor's Site.

name: Gaisei
text:
Is that so? That's perfectly fine.
Without further ado, if I may be so bold,
to be able to cross swords with you all—

Just as Gaisei was cheerfully
saying something ominous...

name: Boy in Student Uniform?
text:
Gaisei-kun!
Honestly, so this is where you were.
Please don't just disappear on your own.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Excuse me for the sudden interruption.
It was like "a bolt from the blue", wasn't it?
My name is Yotaro.

name: Yotaro
text:
I'm his Operator.
I think Gaisei-kun probably
caused you some trouble.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
C-Cute...?
That's so sudden....

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...[Player].
If it's your first time meeting someone, shouldn't you be more polite?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text: Well, I don't really mind, but I think it's better to know someone better before saying things like that...?

name: Yotaro
text:
Sorry for interrupting you during the exam.
...Now, let's go, Gaisei-kun.

As Yotaro tried to pull Gaisei away,
Gaisei spoke with a displeased expression.

name: Gaisei
text:
..."Observer".
Please do not interrupt
my reunion with [Player].

At Gaisei's words, Yotaro's expression hardened slightly.
Then, he stared at [Player].

name: Yotaro
text:
...[Player], is it?
I see, then you know we're villains, don't you?

name: Yotaro
text:
Hmm, I can't hide it, so I guess it can't be helped....
If possible, I'd like you to keep quiet about it....

options.text: I can't just leave Gaisei run wild...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I have to agree with you on that one.
You understand Gaisei-kun, don't you?

name: Pubraseer
text:
...[Player], if I may
have a question?

name: Pubraseer
text:
I don't quite understand
your relationship with them yet....

name: Pubraseer
text:
But they are villains as they are,
do we have a chance of getting into a fight now?

Before [Player] could answer Pubraseer's words,
Gaisei replied happily.

name: Gaisei
text:
—Yes, that's right.
I humbly wish for you to
demonstrate your power in battle.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Hmm, this is the first time
I've encountered a villain who so
politely asks for a battle....

Gaisei happily looked at Yotaro,
as if telling him to hurry up.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Sigh, I guess it can't be helped.
It's not my intention, but it's probably
impossible to act nicely now...

name: Yotaro
text:
I should have taken more precautions.
It's a case of "desperate times call for desperate measures".
—Well then, Gaisei-kun.

Yotaro pointed his terminal
at Gaisei and operated it.

options.text: We have no choice but to face them...

text:
Pubraseer nodded in response
to [Player]'s words.

name: Pubraseer
text:
For now, let's make them behave.
We can continue the conversation after that.

name: Gaisei
text:
The stage is finally set.
...Well then, let's begin.
Let's make it an enjoyable time between us!

name: Yotaro
text:
...Gaisei-kun,
let's keep it in control, okay?

name: Yotaro
text:
If you destroy too much,
it'll be tough to pay for the damages....
—Stop it right there!

name: Hydoor
text:
Hey, you lot!
You don't seem to know
whose territory this is, do you!?

name: Subaru
text:
You seem to be getting quite carried away.
It's a bit troublesome if you make
too much noise around here, you know....

options.text: Pirate Hy-kun, you look so cool!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't you call me Hy-kun...!
What, it's you, [Player].
You're participating too!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha, pretty cool, huh!?
When it comes to being bad, it's gotta be a pirate!
It's been a while since I've worn this!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text: I'm working right now, so if you want to see it, I'll show you properly later.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Subaru
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...[Player]-san?
You're participating in this too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Subaru
dialogue_after_selection.text: I believe that a true villain values honor and sticks to their principles, which is why I'm dressed like this....

dialogue_after_selection.name: Subaru
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...No, never mind.
I'm working, so let's talk later.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, Subaru, Hydoor. Just in time!
We're about to battle a villain!

name: Subaru
text:
What are you talking about, Pubraseer-san?
We know that, since we're the villains....

name: Hydoor
text:
...What, why is Pubraseer transformed!?
You're supposed to be the one getting attacked!

name: Subaru
text:
[Player]-san is here too...
Nobody told me anything, is this ad-libbing?

name: Subaru
text:
...Sigh, I guess it can't be helped.
Then we'll just have to play along.

name: Hydoor
text:
Ah, the examinees are also transformed,
and it looks like a battle is about to break out.
Leave this to me, teach.

Hydoor confirmed Gaisei's presence,
then intentionally put on a villainous face.

name: Hydoor
text:
Don't tell me you don't know
the rules of this territory, huh!?

name: Hydoor
text:
Leave all your money right here!!
You're ready, are you not!?

name: Pubraseer
text:
W-Wait a minute, Hydoor!
This is not the time for that...!

name: Subaru
text:
Oh, pleading for your life, how cute.
I can't be underestimated either,
so I'll teach you some 'manners'.

name: Subaru
text:
Things that happen when you trespass
on someone else's turf, how to make amends...
I'll engrave it into your very bones.

The two called out to the
remote Operator and transformed.

Then, they aimed their Parallel Weapons
at [Player] and the others.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Hoh, interesting.
No, should I say it's a tasteful gesture?

name: Gaisei
text:
I am curious about how much power you possess.
Before our battle, let's enjoy the entertainment!

name: Yotaro
text:
...I don't quite understand, but for now,
I'll direct Gaisei-kun so he doesn't go too wild.

name: Yotaro
text:
[Player], are you sure about this?
It seems you're going to be in
the crossfire too, at this rate...

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Sigh, it can't be helped.
[Player], I'll explain the situation later.

name: Pubraseer
text:
They are acting according to the script.
If we defeat both of them,
they will retreat as per the scenario.

name: Pubraseer
text:
First, could you please be in charge
of the operation to settle this situation?

options.text: We just have to defeat them, right!?

text: Battle Start
